column5: No problem, if I had Mercman's gloves. HH
If it actually existed in nature?  I'd shoot it.  Pretty sure this is Photoshop though.
LOL !!! I was gonna say that.I have a confession to make.I took em off for the Pike pics the other day, but dont tell Sinclair
It's real. Called a Sarcastic Fringehead.  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarcastic_fringehead
I'd hit it with my banjo......
Pretty cool the wonders of natural selection
I'd lip it, no problem lol
Jeez.  More proof that truth is stranger than fiction.  :-)  It looks like the mouth of the lizard from "Jurassic Park" stuck on a big guppy...
Lip it like a bass. No problem.
No you wouldn't..... They would cancel your membership in the Americain Honkey Tonk Bar Assoication.
Rigged on an alabama rig, works wonders
I'm sure Sinclair would reply, but I think he's out saving frogs a mice from an early demise... HH

Would you play it the "Deliverance" afterwards?  Personally i think i would scream like a little school girl and climb to the highest point in the boat...then probably pee my pants...possibly a poop too if it jumped forward...in a manly kinda way of course....  Da da... done done done done done done da....
I think they call them Mother-in-law Fish
Tie it to your line, then wait for it to bite into a bigger fish!
